step0.title: Request to register
step0.desc: Your wallet will open and you will be asked to confirm the first of two transactions required for registration. If the second transaction is not processed within 7 days of the first, you will need to start again from step 1.

step1.title: Wait for 1 minute
step1.desc: The waiting period is required to ensure another person hasn’t tried to register the same name and protect you after your request.

step2.title: Complete Registration
step2.desc: Click ‘register’ and your wallet will re-open. Only after the 2nd transaction is confirmed you'll know if you got the name.
